content: Inactive source removed due to not being actively cited.

¤:cite(["101_further_information"]):¤ Here are some international organizations and resources that you might find helpful:

**EUFAMI (European Federation of Associations of Families of People with Mental Illness):** Promotes the interests and wellbeing of families and caregivers affected by severe mental illness. You can visit their website at http://www.eufami.org/.

**GAMIAN-Europe (Global Alliance of Mental Illness Advocacy Networks-Europe):** A patient-driven organization representing the interests of people affected by mental illness and advocating for their rights. Visit http://www.gamian.eu/ for more information.

**WFMH (World Federation for Mental Health):** An organization dedicated to the promotion of mental health. For more information, the website is http://wfmh.com/.

**Intervoice (The International Hearing Voices Network):** A network for people who hear voices, see visions, or have other unusual perceptions. Their website is http://www.intervoiceonline.org/.

**Mind:** A charity offering advice and support to empower anyone experiencing a mental health problem. Explore schizophrenia resources at https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/types-of-mental-health-problems/schizophrenia/about-schizophrenia/.

**Rethink Mental Illness:** They work to help everyone affected by severe mental illness to
